name: Prehistorik 1+2
description:
Prehistorik, a member of the T-Bone Tribe, is hungry and ready for a bronco lunch! Armed with Diner-Club, his faithful frazzler, he sets off on his food-spotting expedition. Follow Prehistorik from the unexplored ice-fields of Antarctica, the darkend mysterious caverns of the shady continent to the lush jungles of the Tropics.Rhino Dendron
King-Kongorus XII
Chimp-Agogo
Boa-Dee-Sauce
Pyro-Tax
And many other Chops
